page.title: 14JOBS
page.content: Apart from farming there are other {jobs}in the village which are rather popular for instance there are 5 doctors and at least 8 teachers who all live in the village. There is also a photographer in the village who sometimes sells his photos to the press and he also takes video film which means we quite often appear on the local TV as well as in the papers. Roughly 12% of the villagers are unemployed and 33% are retired. With the population of people on the electoral roll at 278 this is around the local average for retirement but below the average for unemployment. As well as a photographer we have a carpenter and a well known local cartoonist who draws posters for the events which go on in the village hall and other places in the village.
